title: Photo Explosion 5.0
description: Photo Explosion has the distinction of being the very first software of its kind to deliver powerful editing features, spectacular special effects and professional-quality photo projects all together in one program. And now, Photo Explosion 5 makes creating with digital photography easier than ever with a brand new user interface and improved workflow for editing, archiving and sharing digital photographs. Version 5 version is packed with more than 100 exciting new features plus 6,000+ photo projects and graphics all designed to let you get the most out of your camera and mobile phone photos. You can even upload your photos, slideshows and video projects to popular social networking websites. Not only is Photo Explosion 5 the most complete digital photo studio software available, it's the only one you'll ever need!
